headline.main: The Text of Premier Stalin's Speech on the Position of the U.S.S.R.

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Nov. 6 Following is an English translation of the speech made by Premier Joseph Stalin in Moscow as broadcast today:
abstract: M Litvinoff apptd Amb to U S
